attributes.action: Change the Lockdown Rules for the Hospitality Sector!
attributes.additional_details: The Hospitality Sector employ over 4 million people in the United Kingdom. With the actual rules, most of the businesses involved with those different types of lockdown will have to close for good. This will causing millions of people to loose their jobs! In the hospitality sector, plenty of measure to keep the spread of the virus have been taken, measures that the government imposed in the first place. Less than 5% of the actual cases are caused by the Hospitality industry.
attributes.background: The Parliament have to take in to consideration the snowball factor that the lockdown is creating for the hospitality, not only for the restaurants, pubs, hotels and so on, but also for all the suppliers, the consultants, the recruitment, all the people involved and the loss of income.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a specific action. We understand that you're concerned about the impact of Covid-19 restrictions on the hospitality sector, but it's not clear how you want these to be changed.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Repeal Covid-19 Restrictions on opening hours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551634

Extend the Covid 19 trading curfew to 12am: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552759

Remove household mixing restrictions and 10pm curfew for hospitality sector: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555671

End the 10pm curfew for Tier 1 immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555706
